item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Yeah that’s inevitable, but I guess this’ll prevent some of it. This thread’s purpose isn’t ‘Stop people from posting threads related to this kind of stuff and just look in this one’, it’s more like a little addition, which anyone can briefly skim through and hopefully learn a little something.

Read full topic

item.title: Learn How To Modify You're Server Here (The Basics)
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

What? I didn’t think it belonged in the tutorial section- it’s not up to the standard required (That may sound silly, considering there’s some rubbish in there, but I’m sticking to my guns). Thus, the thread was born in this section. ‘Help’ being in this section’s title, I thought it was appropriately placed.

x0 0wn, I know lol. I used to do that back then. I’ll just leave it the way it is though.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

p0rt4g43s3 0wn4g3:

Can you help me? You know when you download the java jdk 6u1 stuff then you accept license agreement then all these options come up to see which files you want downloaded, which files you select to make a server?

Read this.

I Br3ndan I:

The one at the very top, pick the offline version. Just click it, you don’t need to check it.

Updated the first page, information about JDK 6u1.

Read full topic
